lead_paragraph: Mr. Fignon was a French cyclist who won more 75 races including the Tour de France in back-to-back years.
snippet: Mr. Fignon was a French cyclist who won more 75 races including the Tour de France in back-to-back years.

headline.main: Laurent Fignon, Gruff French Cyclist, Dies at 50
headline.seo: Laurent Fignon, French Cyclist, Dies at 50
headline.print_headline: Laurent Fignon, Gruff French Cyclist, Dies at 50

byline.original: By FRANK LITSKY and SAMUEL ABT
byline.contributor: Samuel Abt reported from Paris; Frank Litsky from New York.
